Exaggerate: The claim may be considered as an exaggeration because it falsely portrays the picture of Amitabh Bachchan lifting the bier as a representation of him paying last respects to his domestic staffer.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a misreported image that was picked up by the media without proper verification.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the picture of Amitabh Bachchan lifting the bier is related to his domestic staffer, which is proven to be false.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the picture is actually from an incident where Amitabh Bachchan and his son were lifting the bier of his secretary.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim ignores the alternative explanation that the picture is unrelated to the domestic staffer and is from a different incident.
